Segment.name: ST
Segment.comment: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number

Field.name: TransactionSetIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

Field.name: TransactionSetControlNumber
Field.comment: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

Field.name: ImplementationConventionReference
Field.comment: Reference assigned to identify Implementation Convention

Composite.name: C030
Composite.comment: Code indicating the relative position of the simple data element or composite data structure in error within a segment, count beginning with 1 for the position immediately following the segment ID; additionally indicating the relative position of a repeating structure in error, count beginning with 1 for the position immediately following the preceding element separator; additionally indicating the relative position of a component of a composite data structure in error, count beginning with 1 for the position following the preceding element or repetition separator

Field.name: ElementPositionInSegment
Field.comment: This is used to indicate the relative position of a simple data element, or the relative position of a composite data structure with the relative position of the component within the composite data structure, in error; in the data segment the count starts with 1 for the simple data element or composite data structure immediately following the segment ID

Field.name: ComponentDataElementPositionInComposite
Field.comment: To identify the component data element position within the composite that is in error

Field.name: RepeatingDataElementPosition
Field.comment: To identify the specific repetition of a data element that is in error

Segment.name: AK1
Segment.comment: To start acknowledgment of a functional group

Field.name: FunctionalIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a group of application related transaction sets

Field.name: GroupControlNumber
Field.comment: Assigned number originated and maintained by the sender

Segment.name: AK2
Segment.comment: To start acknowledgment of a single transaction set

Field.name: TransactionSetIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

Field.name: TransactionSetControlNumber
Field.comment: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

Segment.name: AK3
Segment.comment: To report errors in a data segment and identify the location of the data segment

Field.name: SegmentIdCode
Field.comment: Code defining the segment ID of the data segment in error (See Appendix A - Number 77)

Field.name: SegmentPositionInTransactionSet
Field.comment: The numerical count position of this data segment from the start of the transaction set: the transaction set header is count position 1

Field.name: LoopIdentifierCode
Field.comment: The loop ID number given on the transaction set diagram is the value for this data element in segments LS and LE

Field.name: SegmentSyntaxErrorCode
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a segment

Segment.name: AK4
Segment.comment: To report errors in a data element or composite data structure and identify the location of the data element

Field.name: PositionInSegment
Field.comment: Code indicating the relative position of the simple data element or composite data structure in error within a segment, count beginning with 1 for the position immediately following the segment ID; additionally indicating the relative position of a repeating structure in error, count beginning with 1 for the position immediately following the preceding element separator; additionally indicating the relative position of a component of a composite data structure in error, count beginning with 1 for the position following the preceding element or repetition separator

Field.name: DataElementReferenceNumber
Field.comment: Reference number used to locate the data element in the Data Element Dictionary

Field.name: DataElementSyntaxErrorCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the error found after syntax edits of a data element

Field.name: CopyOfBadDataElement
Field.comment: This is a copy of the data element in error

Segment.name: AK5
Segment.comment: To acknowledge acceptance or rejection and report errors in a transaction set

Field.name: TransactionSetAcknowledgmentCode
Field.comment: Code indicating accept or reject condition based on the syntax editing of the transaction set

Field.name: TransactionSetSyntaxErrorCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

Field.name: TransactionSetSyntaxErrorCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

Field.name: TransactionSetSyntaxErrorCode3
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

Field.name: TransactionSetSyntaxErrorCode4
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

Field.name: TransactionSetSyntaxErrorCode5
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

Segment.name: AK9
Segment.comment: To acknowledge acceptance or rejection of a functional group and report the number of included transaction sets from the original trailer, the accepted sets, and the received sets in this functional group

Field.name: FunctionalGroupAcknowledgeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating accept or reject condition based on the syntax editing of the functional group

Field.name: NumberOfTransactionSetsIncluded
Field.comment: Total number of transaction sets included in the functional group or interchange (transmission) group terminated by the trailer containing this data element

Field.name: NumberOfReceivedTransactionSets
Field.comment: Number of Transaction Sets received

Field.name: NumberOfAcceptedTransactionSets
Field.comment: Number of accepted Transaction Sets in a Functional Group

Field.name: FunctionalGroupSyntaxErrorCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

Field.name: FunctionalGroupSyntaxErrorCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

Field.name: FunctionalGroupSyntaxErrorCode3
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

Field.name: FunctionalGroupSyntaxErrorCode4
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

Field.name: FunctionalGroupSyntaxErrorCode5
Field.comment: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

Segment.name: SE
Segment.comment: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)

Field.name: NumberOfIncludedSegments
Field.comment: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

Field.name: TransactionSetControlNumber
Field.comment: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

Loop.comment: This X12 Transaction Set contains the format and establishes the data contents of the Functional Acknowledgment Transaction Set (997) for use within the context of an Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) environment. The transaction set can be used to define the control structures for a set of acknowledgments to indicate the results of the syntactical analysis of the electronically encoded documents. The encoded documents are the transaction sets, which are grouped in functional groups, used in defining transactions for business data interchange. This standard does not cover the semantic meaning of the information encoded in the transaction sets.

Field.name: TransactionSetIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

Field.name: TransactionSetControlNumber
Field.comment: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set
